fulltext:
DAO DUY DUONG
CURRICULUM VITAE
EXPERIENCE
Mobile Technical Leader
FPT Software, 07/20016 - present
- Evolving in mobile architecture framework and roadmap
covering languages, tooling, patterns and delivery processes
- Provide technical guidance through the complete Solution
Delivery Lifecycle
- Ensure successfulimplementation of technology solutions
* Develop and document solution architectures for projects
- Training team members to follow the technical design
Senior Mobile Developer
FPT Software, 09/2015 - 07/2016
Serve as key developer for building internal company projects
- Maintain company products
- Mentor other team members for new technologies (Rxswift -
Reactive programming, lonic 2, AngularJS, TypeScript)
- Plan and manage project tasks
 Support others on reviewing and coding
Mobile Developer
Floating Cube Studios, 09/2011 - 09/2014
- Build RESTful services for both server and mobile applications
- Responsibility with project timelines
* Developed web application using JavaScript/HTML,/CSS3
* Developed iOS application using Objective-C
PROFILE
I have 6 years experience working
on mobile development (iOs/
Android) and more than 3 years
working as a full-stack developer
(NodeJS/Angular).
My goal is to complete every project
on time with improved functionality.
believe in hard working, busin ess
ethics and learning new things. I am
reliable and honest provider with
high responsibility.
SKILLS
Communication
8/10
Teamwork
8/10
Adaptability
8/10
Problem Solving
9/10
Leadership
8/10

Objective-C/Swift
9/10
Android/Java/Kotlin
7/10
NodeJS
7/10
Rx (RxSwif/RxJs)
8/10
Angular/lonic
8/10
Xamarin/C#
8/10
Dart/Flutter
7/10
EDUCATION
RMIT University Vietnam
Bachelor of Information Technology, 2009 - 2011
PUBLICATIONS
INTELLISYNC TRACKING SYSTEM, 09/2017, APP STORE - htps://itunes.apple.cCom/us/
app/intellisync-tracking -system/id12108262032mt=8
FLYING DRAGON GAME, 11/2018, PLAY STORE - htps://play.google. com/store/apps/
details?7id=com.DT.FlyingDragon
GAME PLANET, 12/2018, PLAY STORE - https://play.google.Com/store/apps/details?
id=com.nover. gameplanet
OPEN SOURCE PROJECTS
DDMwm, 10/2018, COCOAPODS -A MWVM pattern library for iOS development -
https://cocoapods.org/pods/DDMvvm
interactive_webview, 11/2018, FLUTTER PACKAGE - Plugin that allow Flutter to
communicate with a native WebView - https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/
interactive webview
flutter fbaudience network, 11/2018, FLUTTER PACKAGE - Plugin to integrate
Facebook Native Ad to Flutter application - https://pub.dartlang.org/packages/
flutter fbaudience network
flutter native_admob, 11/2018, FLUTTER PACKAGE - Plugin to integrate Firebase Native
Admob to Flutter application - https ://pub.dartlang.org/packages/flutter native admob
